description.default:
Sylvie is a healer who uses her innate connection to nature and its many friends to heal her allies and harm her foes.

Sylvie is a Healer that uses Pet Management Mechanics. She excels at sending her pets to heal her allies over time and attack her enemies.

She commands her Flutterflies and Plants to heal allies and attack enemies.

Her powerful Heal over Time spells allow her to prepare for battle and endure long and sustained fights.

biography.default:
A changeling abandoned as a child, Sylvie was raised by the creatures of the Wyrdwoods and taught the language of flora and fauna.

Outcast from civilization, she joins the Fellowship in search of kinship and a home she has never known.
